short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly view beautifully formatted YouTube transcripts with punctuations, paragraphs and chapters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scribe will transform your YouTube experience:

** Beautifully formatted transcripts
Scribe delivers transcripts that are easy to read, just like a well-formatted document. Punctuation, proper paragraph breaks, and even chapter-like separators make navigating and reading more efficient.

** Word by word highlighting
Follow along as the video plays by seeing words being highlighted in the current paragraph. And with auto scrolling, experience hands-free reading and listening without having to scroll manually.

** Boost your productivity
Quickly highlight passages you find important, skim through irrelevant sections, and jump directly to the parts you need with the table of contents.

** Accessibility made easy
Transcripts are not just convenient, they're also essential for accessibility. Scribe is amazing for viewers with hearing impairments or those who prefer to learn via text.

Install the Scribe extension and enjoy clear, organized, and easily digestible transcripts.

Contact us for feedback and ideas, thank you!
laurent@appblit.com
